description: 2 Service Battalion Administration Company Building advancing to construction stage
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### 2 Service Battalion Administration Company Building, Petawawa Site, Petawawa, Ontario

**Advanced Procurement Notice (APN)**

The Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is issuing an Advanced Procurement Notice (APN) to alert potential contractors to a future contract opportunity. This is not a bid solicitation.

**Project Overview**

The project involves the construction of a 12,000 square-meter facility for the 2 Service Battalion Administration Company in Garrison Petawawa. The new building will be a multi-use facility with offices, vehicle maintenance areas, and vehicle storage. The project also includes exterior improvements, paved parking areas, and utilities.

The estimated overall project value is $70,000,000. The APN indicates that a competitive bidding process will be used when the contract is advertised in the summer/fall 2024, subject to Department of National Defence (DND) approval.

**Contract Award and Security Requirements**

To be eligible for contract award, contractors must hold a valid and active Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the Secret level. DCC has a sponsorship program under its Industrial Security Program (ISP) that allows contractors to begin the security clearance application process early.

**Industrial Security Program (ISP) Sponsorship**

DCC encourages contractors interested in submitting a proposal for this procurement to begin the security clearance application process by applying for sponsorship under its ISP. Contractors can submit a sponsorship request application to DCC by following the steps outlined on its website: https://www.cdc-dcc.gc.ca/industry/security-requirements.

**Key Dates**

* 60 days prior to planned solicitation/closing, contractors must submit their sponsorship request package to DCC.
* Upon receipt, DCC will review and forward the package to the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Contact Information**

* Cameron King, Regional Service Line Leader, Contracts Services, Defence Construction Canada
	+ Phone: (613) 483-9587
	+ Email: Cameron.King@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

**Disclaimer**

DCC does not guarantee that a sponsorship request package or security clearance application will be successful or result in the granting of the requested security clearance. Contractors assume the risk associated with the completeness or accuracy of their application and the timeliness of the security clearance granting process.

**Accessing Bidding Documents**

The bidding process and documents are available on Merx.com. Fees may apply. Please visit https://www.merx.com
